champions trophy final clinical india wary of old bugbear new zealand team india is set to compete for their third icc champions trophy title against new zealand in dubai on sunday both teams having faced recent disappointments in finals are eager for glory key players like rohit sharma and kane williamson could potentially conclude their odi careers indias dominant journey and strong spin attack fuel high expectations in this finale
reporter rti activist shot in broad daylight in sitapur no description available

sidemen match raises 4m for charities including children in need a soldout wembley stadium was the venue for the sidemen vs youtube allstars football match which saw a side featuring logan paul and mr beast win on penalties

the first of three finals  how good can liverpools season be liverpools dream of achieving the treble was ended last month by plymouth in the fourth round of the fa cup  but they remain firmly in the hunt for three trophies

rubio and trump officials clash with elon musk in an explosive meeting simmering anger at the billionaires unchecked power spilled out in a remarkable cabinet room meeting the president quickly moved to rein in mr musk

us issues do not travel advisory for indiapakistan border citing terrorism the us state department issued a travel advisory warning against travel to areas near the indiapakistan border the line of control and the provinces of balochistan and khyber pakhtunkhwa due to terrorism and potential for armed conflict americans are specifically advised to avoid these regions because of frequent terrorist attacks

ct final unexpected source reveals nzs plans for india new zealand are focusing on countering indias spin attack ahead of their icc champions trophy final in dubai preparation includes specific strategies against indian leftarm spinners kuldeep jadeja and axar with support from net bowlers to simulate match conditions new zealand batters aim to improve their performance against spin to challenge india

ntpc deputy general manager shot dead in jharkhand ntpc keredari coal mines deputy general manager kumar gaurav was shot dead by unknown assailants in jharkhand sparking concerns over industrial security the attack on the hazaribagbarkagaon road highlights rising criminal activities and their potential impact on regional industrial growth and employment
joan dye gussow pioneer of eating locally is dead at 96 an indefatigable gardener she was concerned a colleague said with all the things that have to happen for us to get our food

rohit and gill undertake special practice session before champions trophy final on the eve of the icc champions trophy final against new zealand indian captain rohit sharma and vicecaptain shubman gill practiced early at the icc academy they later joined the rest of the team including stars like virat kohli and hardik pandya at the dubai international stadium for their scheduled session under the scorching sun

sushmita sens exbeau lalit modi to surrender indian passport lalit modi sushmita sens exbeau will surrender his indian passport after obtaining vanuatu citizenship due to legal issues in india nana patekar received court relief from tanushree duttas me too allegations additionally kareena kapoor khan and shahid kapoors hug at an event rekindled fond memories for their fans

ricardo scofidio boldly imaginative architect is dead at 89 with diller scofidio  renfro he brought a conceptualart sensibility to cultural landmarks like lincoln center and to innovative public spaces like manhattans high line
can this man find a link to any welsh person in 60 seconds every week elis james tries to find a mutual connection with a random welsh caller  in one minute

days of clashes in syria kill more than 300 civilians war monitor reports more than 400 people have been killed in fighting between forces of the new government and remnants of the ousted regime said the war monitor syrian observatory for human rights

why celebrating womens day when nothing is being done for their safety sanjay raut shiv sena ubt leader sanjay raut criticized the maharashtra government on womens day for not addressing crimes against women he highlighted recent incidents such as the rape cases in pune and buldhana questioning the celebration of such international days without substantive action to protect women

death penalty for converting girls mp cm says law coming madhya pradesh cm mohan yadav announced plans to amend the law to introduce death penalty for forced religious conversion of girls during an international womens day event the government aims to incorporate the death penalty clause in the madhya pradesh freedom of religion act continuing strict measures against rape and conversion

migrant dies attempting to cross english channel the kuwati man in his sixties suffered a cardiac arrest on the boat that was carrying him from northern france officials said

scammers stole their retirement savings then the tax bill arrived the victims pulled money out of their retirement accounts the withdrawals had inflated their taxable income even though the funds quickly disappeared
trump pulled 400 million from columbia other schools could be next the administration has circulated a list that includes nine other campuses accusing them of failure to address antisemitism

on womens day delhi govt approves big welfare scheme aap hits back the delhi government approved the mahila samridhi yojana on womens day providing rs 2500 to women from economically weaker sections with a budget allocation of rs 5100 crores women earning up to rs 25 lakh annually and aged 1860 years are eligible
i was drawn into a secretive world of chemsex and it turned me into a zombie calls are made to help address stigmas attached to chemsex and improve support

clashes revenge killings leave over 1000 dead in syria all you need to know more than 1000 people have died in syria following intense clashes between security forces and assad loyalists the violence which erupted after an insurgentled government took power has targeted alawites and caused devastating retribution killings
uk troops may need to protect peace in ukraine for many years former national security adviser says the uk needs to be willing to deploy troops for potentially quite a long period

if you have to ask about this harlem dinner party youre not invited membersonly clubs and private restaurants have become powerhouses for socializing and networking but there are some spaces you cant buy your way into

trump allies seek pardons from an emboldened white house the new administration has created a system for awarding clemency that underscores the presidents grievances about what he sees as the political weaponization of the justice system

will be naming more universities after manmohan singh shivakumar karnataka deputy chief minister dk shivakumar emphasized the significance of former prime minister manmohan singhs contributions especially in rural employment as karnataka renames bengaluru city university after him the renaming aims to honor singhs legacy with additional institutions likely to follow suit

5 money lessons every parent should pass on to their kids warren buffett emphasizes early financial education highlighting six key lessons for children these include starting early understanding the power of saving distinguishing needs from wants investing in oneself fostering entrepreneurship and building strong financial habits his animated series secret millionaires club reinforces these lessons setting kids on a path to lifelong financial success

posters to welcome amit shah feature actordirector bharathi bjp blames dmk posters in ranipet and arakkonam intended to welcome union home minister amit shah mistakenly featured actor santhana bharathi causing ridicule on social media bjp distanced itself from the error and state executive committee member a arulmozhi claimed it was a prank to embarrass her and the party she filed a police complaint over the incident

womens blessings my biggest wealth pm modi celebrates nari shakti prime minister narendra modi marked international womens day by emphasizing his governments initiatives for womens safety financial independence and representation he highlighted measures like efir womens economic empowerment programs and praised the increasing female workforce in various sectors while also celebrating inspiring stories of indian women from diverse fields

bjp mocks rahul calling out influenced workers in gujarat cong rahul gandhi urged the gujarat congress to expel leaders and workers who are aligned with bjp stressing the need to reconnect with people to regain trust and win elections he criticised the states struggling industries calling for a new vision to support farmers and revive the sectors

freescoring french leave irish history tilt in tatters ireland hosted france in the aviva stadium seeking to make history instead a signature achievement has slipped from their grasp for the third time in 17 months
russian strikes kill 20 in eastern ukraine the bombardment came after washingtons decision to suspend intelligence sharing and hit a region critical for ukrainian logistics and support

agar koi mar peet karega usay oopar pahuncha diya jaiga bjp mp on holi at amu a controversy erupted at aligarh muslim university after bjp mp satish gautam supported hindu students wanting to celebrate holi stating no permission was needed accusations arose of the university denying a holi milan event which amu officials refuted asserting no special group functions are allowed congress criticized bjp for politicizing the issue

i am a zionist says justin trudeau as over 48k killed in palestine canadian pm justin trudeau declares support for zionism urging canadians to fight antisemitism the israeli embassy appreciates his stance amid a 670 rise in antisemitic incidents in canada concurrently the gaza conflict has caused significant casualties and a severe humanitarian crisis critics call for reevaluating foreign aid priorities given ongoing violence

hundreds of civilians killed by government forces in syria war monitors say more than 1000 people have been killed in fighting between forces of the new government and remnants of the ousted regime according to a war monitor which said about 700 were civilians

bourbon is out patriotism is in  how canadians are facing us threats head on across the country canadians are defiant in boycotting american goods and travel even as trump promises another temporary reprieve

baps hindu temple in californias chino hills vandalised the iconic baps hindu temple in chino hills california faced vandalism with discriminatory messages urging the hindu community to stay united against hatred the coalition of hindus of north america highlighted previous similar incidents and emphasized ongoing concerns about antihindu sentiments
russian strikes kill at least 25 ukraine says russia has stepped up attacks in recent days as the us paused military and intelligence aid to kyiv
covids deadliest effect took five years to appear what once belonged to all of us now belongs to corporations
kenny worry over future of commonwealth games dame laura kenny says she hopes next years commonwealth games in glasgow proves the event is still viable after problems finding a host city
covids longterm effects on the lungs gut brain and more five years on scientists are starting to understand how the virus can lead to longterm sometimes invisible changes

united states to google sell google chrome to  the justice department reiterated its demand for google to divest its chrome browser continuing efforts to dismantle the companys search monopoly the doj aims to end agreements making google the default search engine on various devices advocating for increased competition and consumer choice in the market

sambhal cleric booked loudspeaker seized from mosque over azaan volume in sambhal police acted against a mosque and its imam for using a loudspeaker for azaan at excessive volume violating prescribed decibel limits a case was registered and the loudspeaker was seized there have been multiple similar incidents recently and authorities are enforcing noise pollution rules legal proceedings are ongoing
north korean hackers cash out hundreds of millions from 15bn bybit hack hackers from the infamous lazarus group are in a catandmouse game to launder their stolen funds from the bybit heist

who are alawites and why are they being targeted in syria an ambush on a syrian security patrol near latakia by proassad gunmen has ignited days of clashes leading to over 1000 deaths and deepening sectarian tensions the alawite community formerly central to assads regime faces significant violence and persecution under the new islamistled government

what made amazon founder say i dont care what it costs get rid of her  amazons jeff bezos directed executives to buy out barbara broccolis stake in the james bond franchise after tensions escalated spending nearly a billion dollars broccoli and michael g wilson whove controlled the franchise for 30 years opposed amazons spinoff plans wilsons retirement spurred the sale leaving the future of 007 uncertain under amazons new ownership
gold smuggling case kannada actress ranya rao sent to judicial custody in rs 12 cr no description available
israeli energy minister cuts off electricity to gaza the move which will mainly affect a single wastewater treatment plant appeared intended to put pressure on hamas

hotel owned by relatives bjp targets jk cm over fashion show row a fashion show during ramzan in gulmarg has led to political uproar with bjp accusing jk cm omar abdullah of involvement which he denies mehbooba mufti and religious leaders condemn the event as against kashmiri values prompting a promised government inquiry

trial set for men accused of targeting iranian dissident in new york prosecutors say the men helped direct a murderforhire scheme aimed at masih alinejad the trial is expected to show irans efforts to punish those who criticize it no matter where they are
home secretary rejects call for inquiry into murder of mp david amess the family of sir david amess say the decision is unacceptable and insulting

air indias new york flight returns to mumbai due to bomb threat an air india flight from mumbai to new york was diverted back to mumbai after a potential security threat was received midflight the boeing 777 carrying 303 passengers and 19 crew members landed safely the flight will be rescheduled and passengers are provided with hotel accommodations and assistance air india emphasizes passenger and crew safety
curtis sittenfeld goes home again the bestselling bard of female anxiety rakes over some middle school memories while visiting the city where she grew up

putins useful idiots vances cousin who fought for ukraine slams vp nate vance cousin of vice president jd vance criticized the white houses treatment of ukraines president zelenskyy labeling it as an ambush nate who volunteered to fight in ukraine expressed disappointment over jds lack of effort to seek the truth about the war his own cousin was on the front lines i could have told him the truth without pretense without personal interest he never tried to find out more nate said

some relief cost of veg thali at home goes down in february crisils analysis shows that the cost for a vegetarian thali in february dropped by 1 yearonyear due to lower tomato and lpg prices meanwhile nonvegetarian thali costs increased by 6 as broiler chicken prices surged
king to launch glasgow 2026 commonwealth baton relay king charles will hand the baton to champion cyclist sir chris hoy as the first bearer on its journey

bills quarterback allen agrees record 255m contract extension  buffalo bills quarterback josh allen agrees a new contract extension until 2030 worth up to a reported 330m 255m that will make him one of the highest paid players in nfl history
households near new pylons to get hundreds off energy bills the government says it could help reduce opposition to new projects needed to deliver more clean energy

who likes tariffs some us industries are eager for them concern about the cost of materials has tempered business enthusiasm about taxing imports but steel and aluminum makers say they welcome the help

zelensky is set to meet with saudi crown prince before usukraine talks the ukrainian president is trying to secure a favorable deal to end his countrys war with russia saudi arabia has emerged as a host to talks that the trump administration is pursuing with moscow and kyiv

syrians demand better protection amid a spate of kidnappings when the new government took over it dismissed the assad regime police and other forces leaving a security vacuum now many residents fear going out after dark

avoiding extradition vanuatu pm orders cancellation of lalit modis passport vanuatu prime minister jotham napat has ordered the cancellation of lalit modis vanuatu passport after discovering his intention to avoid extradition this decision followed reports that interpol had twice rejected indias request for an alert notice due to lack of judicial evidence which would have automatically disqualified modis citizenship application

called obscene shivan  narreshs skiwear showcase in gulmarg sparks debate luxury fashion brand shivan  narresh celebrated their 15th anniversary with a grand fashion show in gulmarg jammu  kashmir however the event faced backlash for its timing during ramadan leading to criticism from religious and political leaders for being culturally insensitive
man forced to pay dead fathers 3000 car fines gary davies says birmingham city council did not believe that his father had died

are genetically modified pigs the future of organ transplantation how have the first patients fared after receiving organ transplants from genetically modified pigs roni caryn rabin a health reporter on the science desk of the new york times looks at the results so far

tyler mitchell captures the modern dandy in a new photo essay for the met the 29yearold fashion photographer tyler mitchell had his own ideas about how to shoot the catalog for the museums spring costume institute show
i have to earn right to sing national anthem  tuchel england boss thomas tuchel says he must earn the right to sing the countrys national anthem
tortured and terrified  bbc witnesses the battle for khartoum residents allege terror and rape by retreating rsf fighters as the army makes gains in the capital
those who miss cbse exam today due to holi spillover to get a 2nd chance no description available

sunita williams 9month space mission nears end with iss crew swap and falcon 9 landing nasa astronauts sunita williams and butch wilmore are set to return to earth after an extended ninemonth mission aboard the iss facilitated by the successful launch of spacex crew10 originally part of a shorter boeing starliner test flight their return was delayed due to technical issues the crew10 mission ensures their smooth transition and highlights key developments in space exploration

how maharani gayatri devi turned a robbery into a lesson in grace and style maharani gayatri devi of jaipur epitomized grace and style particularly known for her iconic pearl necklaces and chiffon saris despite being looted at gunpoint in new york city she humorously dismissed the incident pearls especially the coveted basra pearls played a significant role in indian royalty symbolizing timeless elegance and sophistication

whos replacing sunita williams and butch wilmore meet the crew10 astronauts  nasas crew10 mission launched aboard a spacex falcon 9 is set to dock with the iss on march 1516 the mission marks the return of nasa astronauts sunita williams and barry wilmore after nine months due to technical delays with boeings starliner crew10 will undertake scientific research and maintenance tasks preparing for future space explorations

happy 4 wife sanjana pens heartfelt lyrics for bumrah on anniversary jasprit bumrah and sanjana ganesan celebrated their fourth anniversary sharing heartfelt messages bumrahs continued recovery from a back injury has kept him off the field impacting the indian teams campaigns his return remains uncertain as he works on regaining fitness for upcoming matches with mumbai indians hopeful for his participation in ipl 2025

why all 50 pakistan cricketers went unpicked in hundred draft no pakistani cricketers including highprofile names like naseem shah and shadab khan attracted bids during the hundred draft factors potentially contributing to this absence include the involvement of ipl team owners in the hundred and the players modest recent whiteball performances last years issues with no objection certificates from the pcb may have also played a role

from mexico cartel safe house to us streets bbc tracks deadly fentanyl targeted by trump tariffs as the president tries to force mexico to stop the flow of drugs cartel members tell quentin sommerville they will not be deterred
end of era for waiters after 42 years of working together for decades they have waited tables together but now they are about to be separated by retirement
wildfires quickly spread across texas and oklahoma emergency crews in both states were scrambling to keep up with all the blazes popping up across the map
will scrapping nhs england help improve patient safety the decision to scrap the organisation could offer a new chance to examine how patients are dealt with
angelina jolie brings the video game adventurer to life the heroine races against time to find a relic before it falls into the wrong hands

india files appeal in uk court to extradite arms agent bhandari the indian government has requested the uk high court to certify two points of law for a supreme court appeal in the sanjay bhandari extradition case bhandari accused of laundering money and evading taxes worth rs 197 crore allegedly did not declare rs 731 crore in foreign assets on his indian tax returns

only 388 indian illegals in us verified all back govt india has identified and returned 388 illegal immigrants from the us since president trumps mass deportation campaign began verification of nationality is ongoing and the indian government emphasizes the need to address the illegal migration industry and take action against agents facilitating such activities last year india accepted 1368 deportees from the us

elon musks ex  mother of his three children on hardest part of parenting grimes elon musks exgirlfriend and mother of his three children frequently shares parenting struggles on twitter she recently spoke about the challenges of putting kids to bed additionally grimes has denied writing about the sexuality and kinks of fortune 500 ceos
ataglance the key changes to the benefits system how personal independence payments pip and other healthrelated benefits could change under government plans

ban on mosque loudspeakers triggers return of an almost forgotten practice in sambhal in sambhal the removal of loudspeakers from mosques led to the revival of an old practice where men walk the streets calling for sehri mohd shoaib now takes on the role ensuring no one misses the predawn meal enforcing noise regulations officials stress individual voices remain unrestricted sparking discussions on religious expression and state intervention

pelicots daughter pursues conviction that he raped her too her mother gisle was at the center of a trial that gripped france and made her a feminist icon but it left caroline darian with her own pains and suspicions unanswered

he keeps getting better taylor swift and travis kelces old photo resurfaces taylor swift and nfl player travis kelce are seen on dates but try to avoid cameras they maintain privacy after a super bowl incident where traviss team lost and taylor was booed fans are excited to see them again there are speculations about traviss nfl future and taylors new album but no official word yet

ready to deliberate upon uploading boothwise votes poll body to sc the election commission of india eci expressed willingness to consider the demand for publishing boothwise voter turnout data online during a supreme court hearing the petitioners tmc mp mahua moitra and association for democratic reforms have 10 days to make representations before the eci the eci aims to address discrepancies in voter turnout data ensuring transparency
the mums taking on a council over landfill site fires locals say constant fires at arnolds field rainham are harming their health
first picture of north sea tanker collision crew released oil tanker stena immaculate and cargo ship solong collided in the north sea on 10 march

japan reaches peak shohei ohtani as dodgers and cubs open mlb season the los angeles dodgers star is a marketers dream  both a sports icon and national hero in japan ohtani has about 20 active sponsorship deals at any time
nvidia is hosting the super bowl of ai the giant chipmaker has transformed its annual developer conference from an academic event into a whos who gathering for the future of artificial intelligence
artisans in japan uphold the indigenous ainu culture jewelry makers and an embroiderer are among the craftspeople whose creations reflect the indigenous peoples heritage
deadly new strikes in gaza and abortion arrests in texas plus drones on mount everest
prince william pays tribute to last battle of britain pilot who has died at 105 mr hemingway who is originally from dublin joined the raf as a teenager before world war two
search resumes for british tourist after thai boat fire alexandra clarke was reported missing on sunday after a boat she was on burned and sank
how long will hamilton need to find feet at ferrari  f1 correspondent andrew benson answers your questions following a dramatic opening to the season in australia
uk athletics denies paralympians manslaughter abdullah hayayei died after a metal cage fell on him during training at newham leisure centre

did not pay condolences rahul targets pm modi on maha kumbh speech in lok sabha rahul gandhi criticized pm modi for not expressing condolences for the maha kumbh stampede victims during his lok sabha address he also highlighted employment issues pm modi had praised the success of the maha kumbh 2025 attributing its success to the people of india uttar pradesh and prayagraj and countered critics who doubted indias capabilities
americans describe being detained as hostages in a venezuelan prison they were american tourists hoping for a good time they said then they became captives of an autocratic government

elon musk names jeff bezos  google oracle founders as smartest people he knows elon musk praised several tech leaders including larry ellison larry page and jeff bezos for their intelligence and achievements despite musk and bezos past rivalry their relationship appears to be improving notably highlighted by musks recent memes suggesting reconciliation

how coreweave went from crypto mining to wall streets ai bellwether coreweave which provides computing power for ai was founded by three bitcoin enthusiasts the company is now set to make the first prominent ai initial public offering

you need family but  kapil dev on bccis family travel curbs during tours kapil dev emphasises a balanced approach for cricketers families during extended tours aligning with bccis new policy families can join players for limited days depending on tour length virat kohli also highlights the importance of family support for player rejuvenation kapil expressed this at an event featuring top golfers in new delhi

bjp wants to make maharashtra next manipur says aaditya thackeray shiv sena ubt leader aaditya thackeray criticized the devendra fadnavisled bjp government for its handling of the nagpur violence suggesting it aimed to destabilize maharashtra similar to manipur thackeray highlighted the lack of response from the chief ministers office fadnavis addressed the legislative assembly asserting the violence appeared wellplanned and emphasized strict action against those responsible

watch raid on call centre in pak takes bizarre turn as locals loot laptops chaos erupted in islamabads sector f11 after a raid by pakistans federal investigation agency on a fake call center run by chinese nationals led to looting despite the detention of over two dozen individuals locals looted the premises seizing valuables such as electronic equipment

dont think kohli necessarily turned down rcbs captaincy de villiers former rcb batter ab de villiers shared that virat kohli supported the decision to appoint rajat patidar as the new rcb captain kohlis mature reaction and endorsement of the decision highlight his commitment to the teams future rcbs leadership including head coach andy flower praised kohlis respect and support for patidar as crucial for the teams success

tracy morgan vomits courtside during heat vs knicks game what happened comedian tracy morgan experienced a medical emergency during the knicks vs heat game at madison square garden where he was seen vomiting and left in a wheelchair fans and celebrities expressed concern and support yet there is no update on his condition morgan has a history of health issues including past kidney transplant and car accident

deepseek is embraced in china by government nationwide government bodies nationwide have been eager to show they are using deepseeks ai technology since the companys founder met with xi jinping chinas leader
musk is not stopping at doge elon musk isnt stopping at doge

ming fay who made magical sculptures of the natural world dies at 82 his artwork paid tribute to its surroundings in new york city and elsewhere rendering nature at an oversized scale that made it unmissable

bill gates names three key supporters of satya nadella as microsoft ceo bill gates discussed the pivotal decision to appoint satya nadella as ceo with the support of key figures including himself steve ballmer and brad smith gates expressed confidence in the choice reflecting on microsofts continued excellence and successful leadership transition
woman dies after being hit by van on the strand police say the incident which happened close to kings college london is not terror related

npci is making a big change to upi feature widely misused in scams the national payments corporation of india npci is phasing out the collect payments feature from the upi platform to curb fraud this method will now be limited to verified merchants with persontoperson requests capped at rs 2000 while promoting qr codebased payments
